title.rendered: Schedule Your Winter Zip Line Tour With AVA

content.rendered:
If you’re looking for a thrilling winter outdoor activity off the slopes, then check out the winter zip line tours from Arkansas Valley Adventures. You can zoom through the Colorado treetops and take in all the breathtaking scenery the Colorado Mountains have to offer in this safe and exhilarating outdoor adventure. AVA's winter zip line tours take you across 7 cables of pure, flying fun! Traveling up to 30 mph (varies depending on body weight),  your AVA winter zip line course traverses the mountainous AVA Gold Camp property, spanning approximately 44 acres with views of snow-capped peaks and the Arkansas River. Check out the satellite view of our winter zipline course! Ready to experience a winter zip line tour from AVA? Here is some information to help you plan your day. You can schedule zip line tours that involve pick up and those without pickup. Read more and book or quote a zipline tour. Zip line tours are available with pick up:

  • From Breckenridge at 8:45 and 11:45 a.m.
  • From Keystone at 8:15 and 11:15 a.m.

Lunch is provided at 1:00 p.m., which is after the morning trip and before the afternoon trip. With transportation from Summit County, the cost of each zip line tour is $114.00 for each adult (13 years and older) and $104 for each child (10-12 years old). Winter zip line tours operate Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays beginning Friday, February 3, 2012 and then every single day of the week beginning Friday, February 17, 2012. The winter zip line tours from AVA end Sunday, April 8, 2012. Then our summer zip line season begins! Zip line tours are also available without pickup:

  • Drive to our Granite Outpost .  Meet at 10 am or 1 pm (reservations required) and lunch is included after the morning trip or before the afternoon trip.

Join AVA for one of the most exciting winter outdoors activities available in the area. Contact AVA to learn more about winter zip line tours and schedule yours today!  Book a Winter Zipline Tour today!
